metadata.title: CVE-2023-6194 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Eclipse Memory Analyzer versions 0.7 to 1.14.0, report definition XMLfiles are not filtered to prohibit document type definition (DTD)references to external entities. This means that if a user chooses to use amalicious report definition XML file containing an external entityreference to generate a report then Eclipse Memory Analyzer may accessexternal files or URLs defined via a DTD in the report definition.

criterions.comment: eclipse package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
